name: Expanded Fiendish Resistance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/New Racial Rules/Tiefling Feats/Expanded Fiendish Resistance

sections.body: Pick one of the following energy types that you do not already have resistance to: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You gain resistance 5 to that energy type.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, pick another energy type you do not have resistance to. You gain resistance 5 to that energy type.
sections.name: Special
